resources.string: Lost connection with computer. Waiting for reconnect…
If you have used DroidPad before, please update the software running on your computer to the 2.0 version of DroidPad.
Please scan the barcode generated by the computer application. Only scan barcodes on computers that you trust.

DroidPad couldn\'t pair with this computer. Please make sure that you scan a QR code that is generated by the DroidPad computer software. To do this, click File->Pair New Device from the computer software.
The computer %s was successfully paired to this device.

DroidPad now secures the connections between the computer and the phone / tablet. To make sure the communications are secure, please select the \'Pair New Device\' option from the \'File\' menu on the computer. This only has to be done once and ensures secure communications.
To design new layouts for DroidPad, please visit digitalsquid.co.uk/droidpad/layout-editor on your computer, or click the link from within the computer software.
